DOC.brief_summary: A REDUCTION IN C-SECTION RATES USING THE HEM-AVERT® PERIANAL STABILIZER .
DOC.brief_title: A Reduction C-section Rates Using Hem-Avert Perianal Stabilizer
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct evaluate existing FDA approve device call HEM-AVERT® Perianal Stabilizer efficacy reduce Cesarean birth and/or reduce second stage labor .
